scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:types && npm run build:utils && npm run build:ui && npm run build:auth-client && npm run build:auth-context && npm run build:crowdfunding-types && npm run build:forum-types && npm run build:shortcodes
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=@o4o/api-server && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/main-site && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/admin-dashboard && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/ecommerce && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/crowdfunding && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/digital-signage
scripts.build:api: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/api-server
scripts.build:web: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/main-site
scripts.build:admin: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/admin-dashboard
scripts.build:ecommerce: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/ecommerce
scripts.build:crowdfunding: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspace=@o4o/crowdfunding
scripts.type-check: npm run build:packages && npm run type-check --workspaces --if-present
scripts.test: npm run build:packages && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
